resources.string: This application was developed by Yash Mittal at AIT-Budapest.
Any changes would abort current game.

Welcome to Minesweeper Redefined

You goal is to place flags (long press) on a field by looking at numbers which show up when you click any cell without a mine. You can tap and remove a flag too!

You may restart the game anytime by clicking on the emoticon.

Have fun!
